comment.caption: FRANCE2022-POLITICS-ELECTION-INVESTITURE
comment.note: Head of French employers association Medef Geoffroy Roux de Bezieux arrives at the Elysee presidential palace in Paris on May 7, 2022, to attend the investiture ceremony of Emmanuel Macron as French President, following his re-election last April 24. (Photo by Ludovic MARIN / AFP)
